item.description: Base class to display a link between two items.

field.description: The item to use as reference for the end extremity.

field.description: The x position of the start extremity in the reference item.

field.description: The x position of the end extremity in the reference item.

field.name: base_link_visual.end_origin.y
field.description: The y position of the end extremity in the reference item.
